Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri scored a penalty at the 38th minute.
Rahmat Akbari scored at the 70th minute.
Sharif Mukhammad scored a penalty at the 88th minute.
Vikram Partap Singh (India) was shown the yellow card for a bad foul at the 90+6 minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Indira Gandhi Stadium, Guwahati, India.
